subject: Home & DIY
title: Predictive Maintenance: Fixing Before Breaking
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Predictive Maintenance: Fixing Before Breaking.

hook.text: Your washer knows it will breakâ€”two weeks early. A smart sensor on the motor detects subtle vibration changes.

buildup.text: Predictive maintenance uses sensor data and AI to spot wear. An odd motor sound or temperature spike flags trouble.

discovery.text: HVAC with predictive sensors schedules filter swaps, refrigerant checks, and part orders before failures hit.

twist.text: Most appliances still run to failure. You won't know the water heater is dying until you get a cold shower.

climax.text: Samsung and LG now embed predictive diagnostics in appliances. Your fridge will order its own replacement part.

punchline.text: The best repair happens before anything breaks.

quiz.question: How does predictive maintenance detect upcoming appliance failures?
options: By analyzing subtle changes in sensor data like vibration and temperature
By counting the number of uses and comparing to average lifespan
By running diagnostic tests at scheduled monthly intervals
